page.title: 07LIFE STYLES
page.content:
FASHION IN STAMFORD. In Stamford it costs a lot to stay in with the latest fashions. The 'in' colours this summer are pale oranges, greens and blues. An outfit of a blouse and skirt would cost about Â£20 from a fashion shop in Stamford and those that there are are quite expensive, so many people shop in nearby Peterborough.
A DAY IN THE LIFE OF A SCHOOL BOY. (By Matthew Rushton and Dominic Smith) My Dad wakes me at 7.15, I put on my school uniform which is a grey shirt, black trousers, tie and a blazer. I hurry downstairs and and have breakfast with my family before racing out to catch the bus. Once I get to school I go to chapel and the we start our lessons. I have 7 lessons in the day, 3 before break, 2 before dinner
